page.title: 10LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN WALES
page.content: {ADULTS}like hobbies which help to keep them fit. Health and fitness are popular interests at the moment with people of all ages. Women go to 'Keep Fit' classes and both men and women go jogging and to health clubs. Some people have less energetic hobbies too, like reading, knitting or just watching TV. Many men enjoy fishing and playing cricket. Spectator sports such as football, cricket and the tennis at Wimbledon are very popular also. Many people, especially women, go playing "Bingo" each week. {CHILDREN} attend various clubs. Some are members of the Jazz Band, others go to the Swimming Club and Dancing classes. Children like collecting soft toys, stamps, stickers and badges.Bird watching is popular and so is listening to 'pop'music and collecting pictures of favourite singer or actors
